pages.text: Living Armor evolves with you, and now it can grow stronger through spellcasting. Every spell you cast grants experience to your Living Armor, and the new $(bold)Arcane Channeling$() upgrade path provides powerful benefits for spellcasters.

$(blood)Spellcaster's Armor$()$(br2)Wear Living Armor while casting spells to gain experience. The armor learns from your magical prowess and unlocks the Arcane Channeling upgrade tree, specifically designed for mages.

pages.title: XP from Spellcasting
pages.text: Every spell you cast grants XP to your Living Armor:$(br2)$(bold)Formula:$()$(br)Base XP (10) × Spell Level × Rarity Multiplier$(br2)$(bold)Rarity Multipliers:$()$(br)• Common: ×1.0$(br)• Uncommon: ×1.5$(br)• Rare: ×2.0$(br)• Epic: ×3.0$(br)• Legendary: ×5.0$(br2)$(italic)Example: A level 3 Rare spell grants 10 × 3 × 2.0 = 60 XP$()

pages.title: Arcane Channeling
pages.text: The Arcane Channeling upgrade tree provides five levels of spell-focused enhancements:$(br2)$(blood)Level 1:$() -5% Mana Cost$(br)Spells consume less mana$(br2)$(blood)Level 2:$() -10% Mana Cost$(br)Further mana cost reduction$(br2)$(blood)Level 3:$() -5% Cooldown$(br)Cast spells more frequently$(br2)$(blood)Level 4:$() -10% Cooldown$(br)Even shorter spell cooldowns$(br2)$(blood)Level 5:$() Casting Grants Resistance$(br)Gain Resistance I for 2 seconds

pages.title: Upgrade Costs
pages.text: Each level requires Living Armor points:$(br2)• $(blood)Level 1:$() 5 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 2:$() 10 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 3:$() 15 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 4:$() 20 points$(br)• $(blood)Level 5:$() 25 points$(br2)$(bold)Total:$() 75 points for all levels$(br2)These points are earned through Living Armor's normal progression system - wear the armor, gain XP from various sources including spellcasting.

pages.title: Synergies
pages.text: Arcane Channeling works exceptionally well with:$(br2)• $(l:animus:compatibility/blood_infused_spellbook)Blood-Infused Spellbook$()$(br)Stack mana cost reductions$(br2)• $(l:animus:compatibility/sigil_crimson_will)Sigil of Crimson Will$()$(br)Damage boost + mana efficiency$(br2)• $(l:animus:compatibility/sanguine_scrolls)Sanguine Scrolls$()$(br)Cast from scrolls while gaining XP$(br2)$(italic)The armor gains XP from any spell, including those cast with LP!$()

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(bold)Mana Cost Reduction (Levels 1-2):$()$(br)Reduces the mana cost of spells when cast. At level 2, you save 10% mana on every spell, stacking with other mana reduction effects.$(br2)$(bold)Cooldown Reduction (Levels 3-4):$()$(br)Applies Iron's Spellbooks' cooldown reduction attribute. At level 4, spells recharge 10% faster, letting you cast more often.$(br2)$(bold)Damage Resistance (Level 5):$()$(br)Every time you begin casting, gain $(effect)Resistance I$() for 2 seconds. This defensive boost helps you survive while channeling.

pages.title: Tips & Strategy
pages.text: $(bold)Maximize XP Gain:$()$(br)• Cast higher-level spells$(br)• Seek rare/epic/legendary spells$(br)• Use the $(l:animus:compatibility/ritual_arcane_mastery)Ritual of Arcane Mastery$() to upgrade spells$(br2)$(bold)Build Paths:$()$(br)• Efficiency Focus: Levels 1-2 for mana savings$(br)• Rapid Caster: Levels 3-4 for cooldowns$(br)• Survivalist: Level 5 for combat defense$(br2)$(italic)Remember: XP is only granted while wearing Living Armor!$()
